## Raymond Liu Ao

Originally from Lima, Peru, Raymond Liu Ao is a Philosophy, Politics, and Economics student at the University of Pennsylvania. Interested in exploring the uses and implications of AI in daily usage, I will discuss how LLM can help us (or not) in commonly encountered scenarios.
